thread.title: Hillary Clinton Gives a Speech in Honor of Oscar de la Renta at NYFW
thread.title_full: Hillary Clinton Gives a Speech in Honor of Oscar de la Renta at NYFW

author: harpersbazaar.com
title: Hillary Clinton Gives a Speech in Honor of Oscar de la Renta at NYFW
text: This season, one of the most highly-anticipated events at New York Fashion Week didn't include a catwalk. In honor of the late fashion legend Oscar de la Renta , several of the designer's friends and loved ones gathered at Grand Central Station's Vanderbilt Hall to speak at his stamp dedication ceremony on Thursday. Among the event's most notable guests were Anna Wintour, Anderson Cooper, and Michael Bloomberg, all in attendance to pay tribute to the designer and celebrate his forthcoming series of USA Forever stamps (a series of commemorative First Class postage stamps).
